overview: Eleonore lives in the country with her grandmother. She has a flirt, too shy. She dredges her riding teacher, Daniel, vicious and delighted with the bargain. She even shares it with one of her vicious friends. While she is arrested in the forest, she is raped by two hunters. Their consume consummated, it threatens them of their weapon and gets a job with one of them. In the office, she rapes one in turn, in "his" way, then she participates in a fine part ....
title: Une hôtesse très spéciale
